snippet: Russia is poised to advance to the quarterfinals of Euro 2012 with a win or a tie against Greece on Saturday, but their fans have caused plenty of trouble during the tournament.
abstract: Russia is poised to advance to the quarterfinals of Euro 2012 with a win or a tie against Greece on Saturday, but their fans have caused plenty of trouble during the tournament.

headline.main: Russia Solid on the Field, Troublesome Off It
